submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        lst = []
        for i in range(n-1):
            lst.append(1)
        ans = [n-1]
        for q in queries:
            x, y = q
            cur = x
            cnt = 0
            if lst[cur] < 0:
                ans.append(ans[-1])
                continue
            while cur < y:
                tmp = lst[cur]
                lst[cur] = -1
                cur += tmp
                cnt += 1
            lst[x] = y - x
            ans.append(ans[-1] - cnt + 1)
        return ans[1:]
